main event: Jerry Adams and his wife observed a bright circular object with four red lights moving rapidly in the sky on August 7, 1952.
interesting points: The object was described as bright white and trailed a luminous reddish-orange glow., The sighting lasted approximately 10 seconds., The object was estimated to be at an altitude of about 12,000 feet., There was a second sighting of a similar object from a different location nearby., The object made no noise during its flight.
sighted object: a bright circular object with four red lights
